Class PurviewDataSourceClient

The PurviewDataSource service client.

Inheritance
System.Object
PurviewDataSourceClient
Namespace: System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject
Assembly: Azure.Analytics.Purview.Scanning.dll
Syntax
public class PurviewDataSourceClient

Constructors

PurviewDataSourceClient()

Initializes a new instance of PurviewDataSourceClient for mocking.

Declaration
protected PurviewDataSourceClient ();

PurviewDataSourceClient(Uri, String, TokenCredential)

Initializes a new instance of PurviewDataSourceClient.

Declaration
public PurviewDataSourceClient (Uri endpoint, string dataSourceName, Azure.Core.TokenCredential credential);
Parameters
System.Uri endpoint

The scanning endpoint of your purview account. Example: https://{accountName}.scan.purview.azure.com.
System.String dataSourceName

The String to use.
Azure.Core.TokenCredential credential

A credential used to authenticate to an Azure Service.
Exceptions
System.ArgumentNullException

endpoint, dataSourceName or credential is null.
System.ArgumentException

dataSourceName is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.

PurviewDataSourceClient(Uri, String, TokenCredential, PurviewScanningServiceClientOptions)

Initializes a new instance of PurviewDataSourceClient.

Declaration
public PurviewDataSourceClient (Uri endpoint, string dataSourceName, Azure.Core.TokenCredential credential, Azure.Analytics.Purview.Scanning.PurviewScanningServiceClientOptions options);
Parameters
System.Uri endpoint

The scanning endpoint of your purview account. Example: https://{accountName}.scan.purview.azure.com.
System.String dataSourceName

The String to use.
Azure.Core.TokenCredential credential

A credential used to authenticate to an Azure Service.
PurviewScanningServiceClientOptions options

The options for configuring the client.
Exceptions
System.ArgumentNullException

endpoint, dataSourceName or credential is null.
System.ArgumentException

dataSourceName is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.
